privacy.heading: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: At Pizoo, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
privacy.section1_content: We collect information you provide directly to us, including:
privacy.section1_item1: Name, email address, and phone number
privacy.section1_item3: Messages and interactions with other users
privacy.section3_content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information only:
privacy.section3_item1: With other users as part of the service
privacy.section3_item2: With service providers who assist us
privacy.section4_item4: Request a copy of your data
privacy.section5_content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your information. However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.
privacy.section6_content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any significant changes.

cookies.heading: Cookie Policy
cookies.intro: This Cookie Policy explains how Pizoo uses cookies and similar technologies.
cookies.section1_content: Cookies are small text files stored on your device that help us provide and improve our services.
cookies.section2_item1: Essential cookies: Required for the service to function
cookies.section2_item2: Analytics cookies: Help us understand how users interact with our service
cookies.section2_item3: Preference cookies: Remember your settings and preferences
cookies.section3_content: You can control cookies through your browser settings. However, disabling certain cookies may affect the functionality of our service.
cookies.section4_content: We may use third-party services that set their own cookies, such as analytics providers.
